FuncDef:
The mpls te ds-te bcm command specifies a BCM for a DS-TE tunnel.
The undo mpls te ds-te bcm command restores the default BCM for a DS-TE tunnel.
By default, the BCM of a DS-TE tunnel is the Russian dolls model (RDM).
CLIs: mpls te ds-te bcm { mam | rdm }

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the DS-TE BCM to the maximum allocation model (MAM).
-

Sets the DS-TE BCM to the RDM.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The MAM comprehensively isolate services of different CTs. Compared with the MAM, the RDM allows tunnels to share bandwidth, but cannot isolate services of different CTs.
Configuration Impact
Switching BCMs between each other affects tunnels in the Up state. Exercise caution when using this command.
